info.title: FortiOS Monitor
info.description: REST API for configuring FortiOS objects and settings

get.summary:
Get IPv4 ARP table.
Access Group: sysgrp.cfg

schema.title: IPv4 ARP Table
schema.description: List of IPv4 ARP associations for IP addresses to MAC addresses.

ip.title: IP Address
ip.description: IP address of the ARP device.

age.title: ARP Age
age.description: Age of this ARP entry, in seconds.

mac.title: MAC Address
mac.description: MAC address of the ARP device.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

get.summary:
List all active LLDP neighbors.
Access Group: netgrp

port.title: FortiGate Port Index
port.description: Index of the FortiGate port where LLDP neighbor information was received.

port_name.title: FortiGate Port Name
port_name.description: Name of the FortiGate port where LLDP neighbor information was received.

Access Group: netgrp

get.summary:
Retrieve the resolved DNS domain name for a given IP address.
Access Group: any

schema.title: Reverse IP Lookup
schema.description: Retrieve the resolved DNS domain name for a given IP address.

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: Resolved domain of the given IP address.

resolved.title: Resolved
resolved.description: True when the domain is resolved.

post.summary:
Start debug flow packet capture.
Access Group: netgrp.packet-capture

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Possible parameters to go in the body for the request.

ipv6.description: Whether we are debugging IPv6 traffic.

addr_from.description: IPv4 or IPv6 address start of range.

addr_to.description: IPv4 or IPv6 address end of range.

daddr_from.description: Destination IPv4 or IPv6 address start of range.

daddr_to.description: Destination IPv4 or IPv6 address end of range.

saddr_from.description: Source IPv4 or IPv6 address start of range.

saddr_to.description: Source IPv4 or IPv6 address end of range.

post.summary:

Access Group: netgrp.packet-capture
